title: Kevin Hart vs. Chocolate Droppa: What Now?
itunes:title: Kevin Hart vs. Chocolate Droppa: What Now?
description:
WED 10/12 - Kevin Hart stops by The Breakfast Club ahead of his new comedy film, "What Now?" Kevin's interview is rudely interrupted by Chocolate Droppa, whose mixtape comes out the same day as Kev's movie. We appropriately ask: "What now?"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
